data.title: Ricky Paull Goldin's Wife Shares Her Breast Cancer Story!
data.meta_description: Soap alum, Ricky Paull Goldin’s wife, Gretta Monahan is sharing the details of her breast cancer journey. With a video clip of Monahan telling her story, Goldin noted, “My girl shares Her Breast Cancer Journey. Words can not express… You are my WARRIOR PRINCESS. I love you and I stand next to you through it all.“ […]
data.text:
Soap alum, Ricky Paull Goldin’s wife, Gretta Monahan is sharing the details of her breast cancer journey. With a video clip of Monahan telling her story, Goldin noted, “My girl shares Her Breast Cancer Journey. Words can not express… You are my WARRIOR PRINCESS. I love you and I stand next to you through it all.“

Monahan gave a very personal and in-depth look at her breast cancer story from detection, to diagnosis, to bilateral breast survey, to an (not at all minor) infection, and treatment. Monahan told her story on an episode of the Rachel Ray Show, check it out below!

The couple also recently listed their Sag Harbor home for sale. Check it out here; https://therealdeal.com/tristate/2019/10/04/hgtv-host-ricky-paull-goldin-and-gretta-monahan-list-their-sag-harbor-home/

Goldin is known for his soap roles such as; Jesse Tores on The Bold and the Beautiful, Gary Dawson on The Young and the Restless, Jake Martin on All My Children, Dean Frame on Another World and Gus Aitoro on Guiding Light

Share this:
